divs: sighting detailsall five satelite like objects noted with 10-22 pwr bonoculars, all in close to same location in sky (southeast) all dull blue\white changing speed and directions then disapperaing from view heading southeast towards palomar. all 15 to 40 degrees in s.e.. last sighting saw two at once, others were singular. slower than most sattelites some changing direction 180 degrees after slow turns. not visable to naked eye or video cam.
Summary: observed with 10-22 pwr bonocs 5 sattelite like objects changing directions
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 38 other sightings in Riverside
There was one other sighting in Riverside on or around September 17th 2012
